source: What is the term for a collection of information that accompanies data?
target: Metadata is a collection of information that accompanies data.

source: In what language will we write a program?
target: In this tutorial, we will be learning how to write a program in the Prolog language.

source: What is the name of the mathematician who is involved in graph theory?
target: Graph theory is a branch of mathematics that deals with the relationship between data and people.

source: What term is used to describe data that is ready to be used but not yet ready for use?
target: The term 'smart data' is used to describe data that is ready to be used, but which is not yet ready for use.

source: What is the research group developing?
target: The research group in this project is developing an autoencoder for the decoding of audio signals.

source: What type of model can distinguish between real and synthetic examples?
target: The aim of this paper is to show how a type of artificial intelligence called arative model can discriminate between real and synthetic examples.

source: What is a computer program capable of performing repetitive tasks?
target: A bot is a computer program capable of performing repetitive tasks.

source: What can happen to AI models that are too good at identifying examples of different types of objects?
target: A new study suggests that artificial intelligence (AI) models that are too good at identifying examples of different types of objects can be overfitted.

source: What is a good idea for a computer?
target: In this video, mathematician and computer scientist, Dr. John-Paul Sartre, explains why a Turing Complete system is a good idea.

source: What is a machine that can solve problems that are difficult to solve with a computer?
target: The Turing machine is a machine that can solve problems that are difficult to solve with a computer.

source: What are machines that are intelligent and can learn and improve?
target: Intelligent agents are machines that are intelligent and can learn and improve.

source: What is the name of the blockchain?
target: Hash trees are a new type of data structure that can be used to store data in Blockchain.

source: What test did DeepMind pass?
target: The BBC reports that a computer called DeepMind has passed the Turing Test, but only after being tricked into thinking it was a human.

source: What is a mathematical function that transforms a set of data into an alphanumeric code of fixed length?
target: A Hash Function is a mathematical function that transforms a set of data into an alphanumeric code of fixed length.

source: What type of learning is described in this article?
target: This article describes the techniques used in Federated Learning.

source: What is the latest technology used in the construction industry?
target: The latest technology in augmented reality is being used in the construction industry.

source: What does Tomi Oladipo look at?
target: The BBC's technology correspondent, Tomi Oladipo, looks at the future of the internet of things.

source: What will we learn to use in Java?
target: In this course we will be learning how to use a tree in the Java programming language.

source: What is the name of the tool used to train an artificial intelligence?
target: This paper describes how to train an artificial intelligence model on a dataset of values.

source: What is a very useful tool for searching for data?
target: Hash Table is a very useful tool for searching for data.

source: What is the name of the latest living robot created in the lab?
target: Meet the Xenobots, the latest in a long line of living robots that have been created in the lab.

source: What does Sue Perkins explain?
target: The BBC's artificial intelligence expert, Sue Perkins, explains how machine learning works.

source: What is the term for the failure to identify a pattern in a model?
target: In this article, I will be talking about a very common problem in computer science - the failure to identify a pattern in a model.

source: What could virtual reality be used to explore?
target: Virtual reality could soon be used to explore metaverses, according to a new study.

source: What does the acronym GPU stand for?
target: The GPU (Graphics Processing Unit) is a piece of computer equipment that is used to process data.

source: What type of learning can be used in robotics?
target: A new report by the US National Research Council (NRC) has described how reinforcement learning can be used in robotics.
